title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei: Raihousha-hen
synopsis: Following the events of "Scorched Halloween," the world is introduced to a terrifyingly powerful Strategic class magician. In an effort to uncover the identity of this person, the United States of the North American Continent (USNA) dispatches the most powerful asset in its arsenal to Japan on a covert missionâ€”the elite magician unit "Stars" and its commander, Angie Sirius.
